name: S3 Parquet Compaction
shortDescription: Compact small Parquet files in S3 into larger optimized files for better query performance and reduced storage costs.

Variables.Name: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
Variables.Description: AWS Access Key ID for S3 access

Variables.Name: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
Variables.Description: AWS Secret Access Key for S3 access

Variables.Name: S3_BUCKET
Variables.Description: S3 bucket name containing the Parquet files

Variables.Name: AWS_REGION
Variables.Description: AWS region where the S3 bucket is located

Variables.Name: S3_PREFIX
Variables.Description: S3 prefix path to limit compaction scope

Variables.Name: SMALL_FILE_MB
Variables.Description: Size threshold in MB - files smaller than this will be compacted

Variables.Name: TARGET_FILE_MB
Variables.Description: Target size in MB for compacted files

Variables.Name: DRY_RUN
Variables.Description: Set to '1' to preview compaction without deleting original files
